mapper.select: select NUM_ROWS from user_tables where TABLE_NAME = 'FLICKR_WORLD'
select NUM_ROWS from user_tables where TABLE_NAME = 'FLICKR_PEOPLE'

select PHOTO_ID as "id", TAKEN_DATE as "date", LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, USER_ID as "personId", SMALLURL, TITLE, VIEWED from ( select p.* from FLICKR_WORLD p where p.REGION_${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and p.TAKEN_DATE >= to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) and p.TAKEN_DATE < to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} order by p.TAKEN_DATE desc ) where rownum <= #{num}

select PHOTO_ID as "id", TAKEN_DATE as "date", LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, USER_ID as "personId", SMALLURL, TITLE, VIEWED from (select t1.*, rownum rn from (select p.* from FLICKR_WORLD p, flickr_world_split_tag t where t.REGION_${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and t.tag = #{tag} and t.TAKEN_DATE >= to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) and t.TAKEN_DATE < to_timestamp(#{queryStr}, #{dbDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} and t.photo_id = p.photo_id order by t.TAKEN_DATE desc) t1) where rn between #{offset} + 1 and #{num} + #{offset}
